quizTitle: Grade 9 Grammar Quiz: Nouns and Pronouns

questions.question: Which word in the following sentence is a pronoun? 'She gave her brother a gift.'
Identify the abstract noun in the following sentence: 'Her bravery saved the day.'
Define what a collective noun is and provide two examples.
What is the difference between a proper noun and a common noun?
Which of the following is a proper noun?

questions.task: Identify all nouns and pronouns in the following sentence and label the type of each noun: 'The class gave their teacher a surprise party at school.'
